titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Arab Political Posters Collection, 1970s RL.11680
titlestmt.author: Sean Swanick, Meghan Lyon

publicationstmt.publisher: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2018-12-10 20:04:13 -0500.

repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.abstract: Collection of assorted posters in Arabic commemorating revolutionary and political movements in Yemen, Oman, Palestine, and the Middle East.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The Arab Political Posters were received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a purchase in 2018.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Arab Political Posters Collection, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accessions described in this collection guide: 2018-0145

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: 14 posters in Arabic addressing a variety of political and revolutionary movements and events.

did.unittitle: Poster commemorating the 7th anniversary of the founding of al-`Asifah

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Rome (Italy). Unione Generale Studenti Palestinesi Italia. In Italian and some Arabic. The poster commemorates the founding of the armed wing of al-Fatah, al-`Asifah.

did.unittitle: Poster commemorating the 2nd anniversary of the Battle of Karameh

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: France: General Union of Palestinian Students (GUPS). In French with a declaration: "Une grande victoire du peuple Palestinien."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: France: General Union of Palestinian Students (GUPS). In French: Journee de la lutte Palestinienne. In Arabic: Yawm al-niḍāl al-Filasṭīnī (The day of the Palestinian struggle).

did.unittitle: Poster commemorating the 5th anniversary of the Democratic Front for the Liberation of Palestine
Poster commemorating the 5th anniversary of the Battle of Karameh

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: France: Comité permanent d'action pour la Palestine. In French.

did.unittitle: Poster commemorating Justice for Christian Riss

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Imprimerie Abexpress, Paris. In French and Arabic.

did.unittitle: Chinese political poster in support of Palestine

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Shanghai: Shanghai People's Publishing House. In Chinese, English, and French.

did.unittitle: Poster of the People's Democratic Front of Palestine

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Italy. In Italian, French and English. This poster calls for the unity of those against Imperialism and Zionism.

did.unittitle: Poster of armed soldier of al-`Asifah

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Palestine: Official poster of Fatah and the armed wing, al-`Asifah. In Arabic. Commemorates the founding of the Palestinian revolution.

did.unittitle: Poster commemorating the Massacre at Sabra and Chatila

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Cuba: Organization of Solidarity with the People of Asia, Africa and Latin America (OSPAAAL). In Spanish, French and English. The poster is two-sided; one side with child's face and the other side with notes about the massacre in Sabra and Chatila orchestrated by Israel on the Palestinian refugee camp.

did.unittitle: Poster for the Yemen Revolutionary Resistance Organization (ORYR)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Yemen: Yemen Revolutionary Resistance Organization (ORYR). In Arabic. The poster details some of the prominent members of ORYR.

did.unittitle: Poster for the Yemen Revolutionary Resistance Organization (ORYR) suggesting President Saleh is similar to Hitler and Stalin

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Yemen: Yemen Revolutionary Resistance Organization (ORYR). In Arabic. Three figures are portrayed one of each former Yemeni President Saleh, Adolf Hitler and Joseph Stalin. The poster notes that fascism is everywhere.

did.unittitle: Poster for the People's Revolution in Oman

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Paris: Paris cedex Imp. IPCC Sup. a El Jabha. In Arabic and French. Comité de soutien à la révolution en Oman.

did.unittitle: Poster for the People's Revolution in Oman

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Paris: Paris cedex Imp. IPCC Sup. a El Jabha. In Arabic and French. Poster produced for Comité de soutien à la révolution en Oman. Idential image as previous poster RL-11680-P-0013. However, this poster is in yellow and purple and includes the details on a meeting of the committee. Included at the meeting are the musical groups of Chorale de la Penninsule Arabique along with Mohamed Hamam, the Groupe Musical Arabe and Chorale de l'Union des Etudiants Iraniens en France. Taking place at 2pm on 14 March.
